p: Na 2LiAlH 6 has a total hydrogen content of 7.03 wt.% and a theoretical reversible hydrogen storage of 3.51 wt.% (Equation (88)). Na 2LiAlH 6 has demonstrated reversibility (Equation (88)) [ 274, 277], which is enhanced by the use of a catalysts, such as TiF 3, TiFe 3, TiCl 3, CeO 2, ZrCl 4, TiBr 4, CrCl 3, AlCl 3, TiO 2, Y 2O 3, or MnCl 2 [ 276, 277, 279, 280].
